backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user management, role-based access control, subscription tiers, and blob storage via mixins, with hardcoded admin principals and helper functions for user/role initialization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing three high-confidence features for UserManagement.tsx: replacing null early returns with a visible loading state, adding an 8-second timeout failsafe, and wrapping async paths in try/finally blocks.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of all frontend source files, describing each component's purpose and key implementation details for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file that sets up Tailwind directives and defines OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the light and dark theme color system used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that includes an inline pre-React script to redirect non-hash URLs to hash routes, preventing blank screens on direct navigation.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentity, theme, auth, and routing providers, with an AppInner component that calls useAutoInitializeAdmin inside the provider tree.
frontend/src/components/agents/AgentMetr: A dashboard component displaying agent performance metrics (total tasks, completion rate, compliance) with a time period selector and charts for task completion and compliance scores.
frontend/src/components/agents/Complianc: An SVG-based chart component that visualizes agent compliance scores over time, showing average score and color-coded status (high/medium/low) with threshold zones.
frontend/src/components/agents/MetricsCh: A generic reusable SVG line chart component for rendering time-series metric data points with optional area fill, configurable color, and min/max labels.
frontend/src/components/agents/TaskCompl: An SVG-based chart component that visualizes completed tasks over time, calculating average completion rate and trend direction (up/down/neutral) from time-series data.
frontend/src/components/agents/TimePerio: A simple button-group UI component for selecting a time period (day, week, or month), highlighting the currently selected option.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Main app layout component providing a desktop navigation header with multi-level dropdown menus, mobile drawer navigation, and login/logout functionality via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthActionC: A call-to-action component prompting unauthenticated users to log in, available in both full card and compact inline variants.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthDebugSt: A fixed debug overlay that displays the current authentication status, principal, user role, and backend connectivity state for development purposes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: A full-page authentication gate that shows a loading spinner during initialization, a login card when unauthenticated, or renders children when the user is logged in.
frontend/src/components/auth/InlineAuthG: An inline authentication gate that conditionally renders children if authenticated, or shows a fallback/AuthActionCTA component when the user is not logged in.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button that uses Internet Identity authentication, handling login, logout, and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/PrincipalDi: Displays the authenticated user's Internet Identity principal ID in a card, or a 'not authenticated' message if no identity exists.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: A guard component that shows a loading spinner or login prompt if the user is not authenticated, otherwise renders its children.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleDisplay: Displays the authenticated user's principal ID and computed role (Admin or User) based on a hardcoded admin principal constant.
frontend/src/components/auth/WhoamiDispl: Calls the backend whoami endpoint and displays the returned principal, with loading and error states handled.
frontend/src/components/common/AgentStat: Renders a styled badge indicating an agent's status (Active, Suspended, or Pending Approval) with an appropriate icon.
frontend/src/components/common/EmptyStat: A reusable card component for empty states, displaying a title, description, optional icon, and optional action button.
frontend/src/components/common/LoadingSt: Provides two loading UI components: a skeleton placeholder list and a centered spinning indicator.
frontend/src/components/common/SectionHe: Renders a page section header with a title, optional subtitle, optional icon, and optional action element.
frontend/src/components/controlledFanIn/: A card component that displays the predictable-latency channel's status summary, warning count, and configuration controls including a preset picker and checkboxes.
Renders a grid of selectable preset tiles for channel configuration, with a custom-state panel shown when the user has deviated from predefined presets.
frontend/src/components/notary/HashUtils: Utility module providing SHA-256 hashing functions for text and files, plus hex conversion helpers for the AI Notary system.
frontend/src/components/notary/NotaryCer: Renders a notarization certificate card displaying verification ID, timestamp, content hash, content preview, and dual AI agent attestations, with a download button.
frontend/src/components/notary/ProofPars: Provides utility functions to parse proof documents in text, JSON, and PDF formats, extracting agent name, type, capabilities, timestamp, and digital signature into a ProofData object.
frontend/src/components/notary/ProofVeri: Displays the result of a proof verification, showing validity status badge, message, agent details, capabilities, timestamp, and an expandable signature comparison section.
Verifies a proof document by recomputing its SHA-256 signature from canonical proof data and comparing it against the stored signature, returning a VerificationResult.
frontend/src/components/notary/useCertif: Custom hook that provides a downloadCertificate function, which serializes a NotarizationRecord into a JSON certificate file and triggers a browser download.
frontend/src/components/notary/Verificat: A simple badge component that displays a green 'Valid Proof' or red 'Invalid Proof' badge based on a boolean isValid prop.
frontend/src/components/partners/APIKeyM: UI component for managing partner API credentials, offering save and test-connection actions with validation, loading states, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/partners/Partner: Renders a card UI for a single integration partner, displaying its icon, name, category, connection status badge, API credential input fields, and connect/view-details actions with an enable toggle checkbox.
A modal dialog that shows detailed information about a selected partner, including its status badge, integration capabilities, configuration steps, and a link to API documentation.
Provides search, category, and connection-status filter controls for the partners list, along with a results count display and a clear-filters button.
frontend/src/components/timeai/EvidenceI: A form component for creating a compliance evidence item, allowing the user to select a control, write a description, and optionally link an existing notarization record.
frontend/src/components/timeai/NotaryPro: Displays details of a linked notarization record for an evidence item, including timestamp and content preview, with options to view or download the notarization certificate in a dialog.
frontend/src/components/timeai/WorkflowR: A dialog triggered by a button that lets users create a new workflow run by entering a name and optional description, submitting via the useCreateWorkflowRun mutation.
frontend/src/components/trade/analytics/: Displays a filterable compliance audit log table of token-affecting events (mint, burn, transfer, etc.) for TIME/TRAV tokens, fetched via the useComplianceLog hook.
Shows a market overview card for a given token with real-time metrics including current price, 24h volume, circulating supply, and market cap fetched from useCurrentPrice and useTokenAnalytics hooks.
Renders a tabbed card displaying the live open order book and recent trades for a token, using useOpenOrders and useRecentTrades hooks with loading and empty states.

Displays a revenue and fees dashboard card summarizing total fees collected, tokens burned, and net revenue for TIME and TRAV tokens, with a per-token breakdown table sourced from useFeeTotals and useBurnedTotals hooks.

React component that displays token supply and distribution analytics (circulating, staked, and total available supply) for TIME or TRAV tokens using progress bars and formatted numbers fetched via useTokenAnalytics.

React component that shows token economy health metrics including total fees collected, tokens burned, burn rate, and other economic ratios for a given TIME or TRAV token using useFeeTotals and useBurnedTotals hooks.
frontend/src/components/trade/PriceChart: Renders an SVG-based price chart card for TIME or TRAV tokens, showing a polyline and area fill derived from historical price data with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/content/agentRegistryEntrie: Static data file defining the AgentRegistryEntry interface and an array of sample AI agent entries (e.g., Compliance Sentinel, Security Guardian) with capabilities, credentials, policy scopes, and verification statuses.
frontend/src/content/complianceFramework: Static data file defining compliance framework structures (EU AI Act and ISO 42001) with their controls, plus helper functions to look up frameworks and controls by ID.
frontend/src/content/recommendedAddition: Static data file exporting categorized lists of recommended AI-powered feature additions (e.g., for Financial Services, Supply Chain, World Trade) with titles, descriptions, and keywords.
frontend/src/content/searchIndex.ts: Builds and exports a combined search index by merging route-derived search entries (filtered from the router) with additional manually defined entries, each containing path, title, description, keywords, and category.
frontend/src/content/solutionsCatalog.ts: Defines a catalog of solution entries (companies like FedEx, Walmart, etc.) with metadata including title, icon, description, route path, category, and search keywords across industries like Logistics, Retail, Finance, and more.
frontend/src/content/workflowPacks.ts: Defines a list of purchasable workflow pack products (e.g., Compliance Audit Trail, Supply Chain Orchestration) with id, name, description, category, and monthly pricing.
frontend/src/content/worldsFirstItems.ts: Defines a collection of 'World's First' product feature entries with titles, descriptions, key features, use cases, and suggested visuals highlighting unique AI governance capabilities.
frontend/src/data/partnerIntegrations.ts: Exports a list of third-party partner integrations (e.g., Salesforce, Stripe, Snowflake) with connection status, API credential field definitions, and documentation URLs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, reinitializing it when the Internet Identity changes and invalidating dependent queries accordingly.
frontend/src/hooks/useAgentMetrics.ts: Provides three React Query hooks for fetching agent metrics: per-agent summary, per-agent time series data, and aggregate metrics across all agents, with configurable time periods.
frontend/src/hooks/useAgents.ts: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoInitializeAdmi: React hook that automatically calls the backend's initializeAdmin once per session for principals listed in ADMIN_PRINCIPALS, guarded by role checks, actor readiness, and sessionStorage idempotency.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendAgentDesign: React Query hook for CRUD operations on agent designs stored in the backend canister, requiring authentication via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useBuy.ts: React Query mutation hook that simulates buying TIME or TRAV tokens by placing a buy trade order on the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCommunity.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating community topics and replies via the backend actor, with toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useComplianceLog.ts: React Query hook that fetches and normalizes token operation compliance log entries from the backend, supporting filtering by token type and event type.
frontend/src/hooks/useControlledFanIn.ts: React hook wrapping the ControlledFanIn utility to manage concurrent multi-source async processing, exposing results, metrics, and control callbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useControlledFanOut.t: React hook wrapping the ControlledFanOut utility to manage concurrent task execution, exposing results, metrics, and start/cancel/reset controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useConvert.ts: React Query hooks for fetching token conversion rates and performing TIME/TRAV token conversions; conversion mutation is stubbed pending backend implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useEnterpriseOnboardi: React Query hooks for submitting and managing enterprise onboarding requests, including admin-only hooks for listing all requests and updating their status.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetAllUsers.ts: React Query hook that fetches all registered users with their roles from the backend, calling initializeAdmin first to ensure the caller is registered.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetMyRole.ts: React Query hook that retrieves and maps the authenticated user's role (admin or user) from the backend canister.
frontend/src/hooks/useGovernance.ts: Provides React Query hooks for governance proposals: fetching proposals, creating proposals, and voting. Backend calls are stubbed with TODOs and currently throw unimplemented errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useGreet.ts: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/hooks/useHandoff.ts: Empty file with no content or exports.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication via DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing a React context provider and hook with login, logout, and identity state management including delegation validity checks.
Manages a list of agent designs (name and role description) persisted in localStorage, exposing CRUD operations via React state.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarket.ts: Provides React Query hooks for trading functionality: fetching open orders, recent trades, current token price, and placing trade orders via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useMarketplace.ts: Provides React Query hooks for marketplace operations: listing items, fetching a single item by ID, unlocking items, and retrieving the user's unlocked items.
frontend/src/hooks/useNavbarOverflow.ts: Calculates how many navbar items fit within a maximum number of rows based on DOM measurements, returning visible and overflow counts with resize handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useNextUpgradeSelecti: Manages a user's selected upgrade theme stored in localStorage, and exports a static list of available upgrade themes with IDs, titles, and descriptions.
Manages partner integration connection states (connecting, connected, not_connected) with simulated async API calls, persisting state to localStorage and showing toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/usePartnerFilters.ts: Filters a list of partners by search query, category, and connection status using memoized computation, and exposes state setters and a clear function.
frontend/src/hooks/usePredictableLatency: React hook that manages a predictable latency channel configuration with preset options (minimal, standard, diagnostics, custom), persisting both the config and selected preset to localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/usePriceSeries.ts: React Query hook that fetches the current market price from the actor and generates a simulated 24-hour price history series with random variance, falling back to placeholder data on error.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for marketplace items, notarization records, and roadmap data, providing both query and mutation operations against the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRewards.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user reward points and events, including earning and redeeming points via backend actor calls with toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useSolutionsAdditions: Provides hooks to access the static solutions catalog, filter solutions by category, and retrieve all unique categories, with no dynamic add/remove functionality.
frontend/src/hooks/useStaking.ts: React Query hooks for staking and unstaking TIME/TRAV tokens; backend calls are stubbed out with TODOs and currently throw unimplemented errors after a simulated delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubscription.ts: React Query and mutation hooks for getting and setting a user's subscription tier via the backend actor, keyed by the authenticated user's principal.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenAnalytics.ts: React Query hook that fetches token distribution data from the backend and maps it to analytics fields (circulating supply, available supply, trading volume, staked supply) for a given TIME or TRAV token.
frontend/src/hooks/useTokenomics.ts: React Query hooks for tokenomics configuration, fee totals, and burned token totals; config returns hardcoded defaults while fee and burn data are derived from the backend's burn analysis endpoint.
frontend/src/hooks/useTransfers.ts: React mutation hook for transferring TIME or TRAV tokens; the actual backend call is stubbed with a TODO and currently throws an unimplemented error after a simulated delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useWallet.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching wallet balances, addresses, and transaction history, with placeholder implementations pending backend integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useWhoami.ts: React Query hook that calls the backend `whoami` method to retrieve the current authenticated user's principal, enabled only when an actor and identity are available.
frontend/src/hooks/useWorkflowEvidence.t: Provides React Query and mutation hooks for managing workflow runs, evidence items, and notarization records, including CRUD operations and a timestamp formatter.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for the TIME AI brand color palette in both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AgentCapabilityProofG: Page component for generating and verifying agent capability proof documents in PDF, JSON, or text formats, with cryptographic signature computation and file upload/paste verification support.
frontend/src/pages/AgentDesigner.tsx: A page component for creating and editing AI agent designs with name and role description fields, supporting both local storage (unauthenticated) and backend persistence (authenticated via Internet Identity).
frontend/src/pages/AgentPassports.tsx: A page that displays agent passport details including verification status, metrics, and configuration for the authenticated user's agents, fetched from the backend canister.
frontend/src/pages/AgentRegistry.tsx: A searchable and filterable catalog page displaying all registered AI agents with their capabilities, categories, verification statuses, and issue dates from static registry content.
frontend/src/pages/AINotary.tsx: Page component for the AI Notary feature, allowing authenticated users to notarize text content, verify existing notarizations, and view or download notarization certificates.
frontend/src/pages/AITaxAssistance.tsx: Static informational page providing general tax preparation guidance, including disclaimers, document checklists, and accordion-style FAQ sections.
frontend/src/pages/APIDocumentation.tsx: Placeholder page component that renders a bare API Documentation heading with no content yet.
frontend/src/pages/APIKeys.tsx: Placeholder page component that renders a bare API Keys heading with no content yet.
frontend/src/pages/AuditLogs.tsx: A minimal placeholder page component that renders an empty Audit Logs heading with no functional content yet.
frontend/src/pages/BrowserSearch.tsx: A backward-compatible redirect component that forwards users to the unified /search page, preserving any existing query parameter.
frontend/src/pages/Community/AITalk.tsx: A community discussion forum page where authenticated users can create and browse topics, backed by community hooks that interact with the backend canister.
frontend/src/pages/Community/CommunityHu: A landing hub page for the community section that provides navigation cards to News & Updates, AI Talk discussions, and lists community resources like events and documentation.
frontend/src/pages/Community/News.tsx: Displays a static list of platform news items with title, date, category badge, and excerpt, plus a 'Coming Soon' card listing upcoming features.
frontend/src/pages/Community/TopicDetail: Shows a community forum topic's detail view with its replies, and allows authenticated users to add new replies; handles loading, error, and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/ComplianceReports.tsx: Placeholder page component that renders only a 'Compliance Reports' heading with no additional content.
frontend/src/pages/ConnectionStatus.tsx: Placeholder page component that renders only a 'Connection Status' heading with no additional content.
frontend/src/pages/ControlledFanInDemo.t: Interactive demo page for the controlled fan-in utility, allowing users to configure multiple async sources, concurrency, failure rate, and ingestion rate, then visualize per-item processing results and metrics in a table.
Interactive demo page for the controlled fan-out utility, letting users configure task count, concurrency, and failure rate to observe bounded parallel task execution with per-task status badges and metrics.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboards/Commoditie: Educational/informational dashboard displaying simulated commodity categories (Energy, Metals, Agriculture, Livestock) with a disclaimer that no real trading or transactions are available.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboards/RWA.tsx: Educational dashboard illustrating Real-World Asset concepts such as tokenization and fractionalization through simulated vaults and conceptual examples, with a disclaimer that no real transactions are supported.
Page for submitting and managing enterprise onboarding requests, with a form for company/contract details, status badges, and an admin view for reviewing all requests.
frontend/src/pages/GlobalRailsIntegratio: Informational page describing TIME AI's role as a governance and compliance orchestration layer above global payment rails like SWIFT, FedNow, and stablecoins.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing/home page displaying TIME AI's hero section and a subscription plan selector (Free, Basic, Pro, Enterprise) with upgrade/downgrade functionality.
frontend/src/pages/IndustryKits.tsx: Placeholder page component that renders a heading for Industry Kits with no additional content.
frontend/src/pages/IntegrationMarketplac: Placeholder page component that renders an empty container div for the Integration Marketplace.
frontend/src/pages/IntegrationRollout.ts: Page outlining a multi-step integration rollout plan with steps like MCP Tool Registry, Runtime Security Monitor, Data-Format Hub, and Workflow Marketplace, each with deliverables and definition-of-done criteria.
frontend/src/pages/Marketplace/AgentMark: Placeholder page component that renders an empty container div for the Agent Marketplace.
frontend/src/pages/Marketplace/Integrati: Placeholder page component that renders an empty container div for the Integration Marketplace (nested under Marketplace directory).
frontend/src/pages/Marketplace/Marketpla: Detail page for a single marketplace item, showing its description, token price, lock/unlock status, and a button to unlock the item using token balance.
Displays a searchable grid of marketplace items fetched via `useMarketplaceItems`, with a banner, search input, loading/error/empty states, and navigation to individual item pages.
frontend/src/pages/Marketplace/Monetizat: Placeholder page component for Monetization that renders an empty container div.
frontend/src/pages/Marketplace/WorkflowM: Placeholder page component for Workflow Marketplace that renders an empty container div.
frontend/src/pages/Markets.tsx: Displays a Markets overview page showing live TIME AI and TRAV AI token prices fetched via `useCurrentPrice`, along with market overview, activity, and FAQ accordion sections.
frontend/src/pages/NextUpgrade.tsx: Allows users to select and persist a preferred next platform upgrade theme from a list, showing the current selection or a theme-selection grid with descriptions and features.
frontend/src/pages/Operations/AITaxAssis: Informational page providing AI-assisted tax guidance including a disclaimer, target audience, documents to gather, deductions, deadlines, and FAQ accordionâ€”without constituting professional tax advice.
frontend/src/pages/Operations/Enterprise: Placeholder page component for Enterprise Onboarding that renders a heading inside a container.
frontend/src/pages/Operations/NextUpgrad: Placeholder page component for Next Upgrade that renders a heading inside a container.
frontend/src/pages/Operations/PlatformAd: Placeholder page component for Platform Additions that renders a heading inside a container.
frontend/src/pages/Operations/RWADashboa: Placeholder page component for the RWA Dashboard that renders a heading inside a container.
frontend/src/pages/Operations/SystemStat: Placeholder page component for System Status that renders a heading inside a container.
frontend/src/pages/Operations/UserManage: Admin-only user management page that fetches the caller's role and all users, calls `ensureCallerUserExists` on mount, and displays a user table with role badges, loading states, and a timeout-based error failsafe.
frontend/src/pages/PartnerIntegration.ts: Full-featured partner integration page that lists, filters, and manages external partner connections, persisting enabled partners and credentials to localStorage.
frontend/src/pages/PartnerIntegrationLay: Placeholder page component that renders a simple heading for the Partner Integration Layer route.
frontend/src/pages/PolicyConflicts.tsx: Placeholder page component that renders a simple heading for the Policy Conflicts route.
frontend/src/pages/PolicyEngine.tsx: Placeholder page component that renders a simple heading for the Policy Engine route.
Page that displays filterable strategic platform additions, allowing authenticated users to select items with priorities and save them as a roadmap via backend mutation.
frontend/src/pages/Resources/Documentati: Placeholder page component that renders a simple heading for the Documentation route.
frontend/src/pages/Resources/News.tsx: Placeholder page component that renders a simple heading for the News route.
frontend/src/pages/Resources/Partners.ts: Placeholder page component that renders a simple heading for the Partners route.
frontend/src/pages/Resources/Support.tsx: Placeholder page component that renders a simple heading for the Support route.
frontend/src/pages/Resources/Training.ts: Placeholder page component that renders a simple heading for the Training route.
frontend/src/pages/RewardsIncentives.tsx: Page displaying a user's reward points and event history, with a daily claim action; shows a login prompt for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/Roadmap.tsx: Page that displays an authenticated user's saved roadmap items grouped by priority (high/medium/low), with a CTA to add more items from the RecommendedAdditions page.
frontend/src/pages/RolePermissions.tsx: Placeholder page component that renders a simple heading for the Role Permissions route.
frontend/src/pages/Search.tsx: Unified search page that queries site content and resolves navigation matches, allowing Enter-key navigation to matched routes.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/Aethir.tsx: Renders a solution page for Aethir (ATH), a decentralized GPU cloud network, listing four problems and corresponding solutions using the SolutionTemplate component.
Renders a solution page for Alchemy Pay (ACH), a fiat-crypto payment gateway, detailing problems around conversion friction and compliance alongside their solutions.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/Algorand.ts: Renders a solution page for Algorand (ALGO), covering its pure proof-of-stake blockchain's approach to the blockchain trilemma, smart contracts, and energy efficiency.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/Amazon.tsx: Renders a solution page for Amazon Logistics, outlining last-mile delivery, fulfillment, and driver coordination problems with AI-powered solutions.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/AMD.tsx: Solution page for AMD describing its business problems and corresponding platform solutions using the shared SolutionTemplate component.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/Anthropic.t: Renders a solution page for Anthropic, addressing constitutional AI alignment, model scaling safety, and evaluation framework challenges with RLHF and red-teaming solutions.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/Apple.tsx: Renders a solution page for Apple, covering supply chain complexity, ecosystem integration, privacy at scale, and retail coordination with AI-driven solutions.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/Avalanche.t: Renders a solution page for Avalanche, addressing subnet deployment, cross-subnet communication, institutional compliance, and gas fee optimization.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/AWS.tsx: Solution page for AWS describing common operational problems and their resolutions using the shared SolutionTemplate component.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/Base.tsx: Renders a solution page for Base (Coinbase Layer 2), addressing transaction throughput, bridge security, developer tooling, and gas fee optimization.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/Binance.tsx: Renders a solution page for Binance (BNB), covering scalability, global regulatory compliance, liquidity management, and ecosystem coordination challenges.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/BlackRock.t: Renders a solution page for BlackRock, addressing institutional asset tokenization, portfolio management, DeFi access, and ESG tracking using blockchain.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/Bloomberg.t: Renders a solution page for Bloomberg, covering data aggregation, terminal performance, analytics accuracy, and AI-powered news distribution.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/Boeing.tsx: Renders a solution page for Boeing, addressing quality control, supply chain disruptions, certification processes, and after-market fleet service.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/BRICS.tsx: Renders a solution page for BRICS economic cooperation, covering cross-border payments, currency exchange, data sharing, and development bank financing.
Renders a custom solution page for Caffeine AI with a background image, listing workflow, agent routing, and governance problems alongside structured pipeline and audit logging solutions using Card components.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/Cardano.tsx: Renders a solution page for Cardano, addressing formal verification, EUTXO complexity, Plutus learning curve, and on-chain governance challenges.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/CasperNetwo: Renders a solution page for Casper Network (CSPR), covering smart contract upgradeability, enterprise adoption, governance, and developer tooling.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/Chainlink.t: Renders a solution page for Chainlink, addressing oracle centralization, data quality, cross-chain interoperability, and smart contract automation reliability.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/Cisco.tsx: Renders a Cisco solutions page displaying fixed problems (network outages, security vulnerabilities, routing inefficiencies) and resolutions (automated validation, zero-trust access, predictive monitoring) using custom Card components.
Renders a Cloudflare solutions page via SolutionTemplate, covering DDoS mitigation, edge computing latency, network optimization, and Zero Trust security problems with corresponding solutions.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/Coinbase.ts: Renders a Coinbase solutions page via SolutionTemplate, covering exchange scalability, institutional custody, regulatory compliance, and user onboarding challenges with solutions.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/CoinGecko.t: Renders a CoinGecko solutions page via SolutionTemplate, addressing crypto market data aggregation, price manipulation detection, API scaling, and token listing verification.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/Comex.tsx: Renders a Comex solutions page via SolutionTemplate, addressing commodity settlement complexity, market data latency, risk management, and warehouse receipt fraud prevention.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/Constellati: Renders a Constellation Network solutions page via SolutionTemplate, covering DAG scalability, enterprise data validation, network performance, and developer tooling challenges.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/Copper.tsx: Renders a Copper solutions page via SolutionTemplate, addressing digital banking infrastructure scalability, regulatory compliance, fraud detection, and KYC verification.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/Costco.tsx: Renders a Costco solutions page via SolutionTemplate, covering bulk inventory management, membership optimization, warehouse space utilization, and supplier quality control.
Renders a Databricks solutions page via SolutionTemplate, covering data lake complexity, ML deployment gaps, Spark cost management, and cross-team collaboration challenges.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/DFINITY.tsx: Renders a DFINITY solutions page displaying fixed problems (developer onboarding, identity flow confusion, lack of templates) and resolutions (modular templates, simple identity flows, code pattern separation) using custom Card components.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/DHL.tsx: Renders a DHL solutions page displaying fixed problems (customs rejections, slow delivery, seasonal backlogs, misrouted packages) and resolutions (automated validation, AI routing, compliance alerts, label verification) using custom Card components.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/Discord.tsx: Renders a Discord solutions page via SolutionTemplate, addressing real-time messaging scalability, voice/video quality, bot API management, and community moderation.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/DOT.tsx: Renders a DOT solutions page via SolutionTemplate, addressing fragmented transportation data, manual compliance tracking, infrastructure maintenance planning, and slow incident response.
Renders a DuckDuckGo solutions page via SolutionTemplate, covering privacy-preserving search, search quality without personalization, app distribution, and non-behavioral revenue generation.
frontend/src/pages/Solutions/Ethereum.ts: Renders an Ethereum solutions page via SolutionTemplate, addressing high gas fees, smart contract vulnerabilities, slow confirmations, and DeFi integration challenges.

frontend/src/pages/WorldsFirst.tsx: Showcase page displaying 50 TIME AI world-first innovations in a card grid with numbered badges, icons mapped from a content file, and navigation support.
frontend/src/router/hashRedirect.ts: Exports a utility function that detects non-root pathnames without hash routes and redirects to the equivalent hash-based URL to prevent 404s on page refresh.
frontend/src/router/Router.tsx: Defines the full TanStack Router configuration for the app, creating all routes and nesting them under a root layout with AppLayout. Imports and maps every page component to its corresponding route path.
frontend/src/router/routes.ts: Defines a typed metadata registry for all application routes, including path, label, description, keywords, and category for each route.
frontend/src/router/solutionPageMap.tsx: Provides a centralized mapping from solution route paths to their React page components, importing all partner/solution pages and exporting a lookup object for dynamic rendering.
frontend/src/types/partners.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and types for partner integrations, including Partner, ApiCredentialField, PartnerCategory, and ConnectionStatus.
frontend/src/types/proof.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for proof verification data, including ProofData and VerificationResult structures.
frontend/src/utils/controlledFanIn.ts: Implements a ControlledFanIn class that ingests items from multiple async generator sources into a single queue and processes them with bounded concurrency, tracking per-item status, timing, and errors with cancellation support.
frontend/src/utils/controlledFanOut.ts: Implements a ControlledFanOut class that runs an array of async task factories with bounded concurrency, tracking per-task status, timing, results, and errors with cancellation support.
frontend/src/utils/fileDownload.ts: Provides utility functions for browser file downloads, including filename sanitization, timestamp formatting, triggering blob downloads via anchor elements, and generating PDFs from HTML using the print dialog.
frontend/src/utils/omnibox.ts: Implements a unified omnibox utility that resolves user text input to app route navigation matches by checking against route paths and labels, with label matches taking priority.
frontend/src/utils/search.ts: Provides scored full-text search over a static search index, weighting matches by title, keywords, description, and category, plus a helper to group results by category.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters from both standard and hash-based routing, persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash without a page reload.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with OKLCH-based design tokens for colors, custom border radii, box shadows, and font families, with dark mode, typography, container queries, and animation plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Tracks the current project state (version 3) for a fix targeting a blank-screen bug on the /operations/user-management page, documenting three implemented features: removing null returns during loading, adding an 8-second timeout failsafe, and wrapping async paths in try/finally blocks.
